name: Alex Chen
title: VR Developer & AI Engineer
tagline: Building immersive experiences at the intersection of Virtual Reality and Artificial Intelligence
about: I'm a software engineer passionate about creating next-generation experiences through Virtual Reality, AI, and robust software testing. With 5+ years of experience, I specialize in developing immersive VR applications, implementing machine learning solutions, and building comprehensive testing frameworks. My work focuses on pushing the boundaries of what's possible in interactive technology.
